title: 66A.28 REPORTS; DELINQUENCY; POWERS OF COMMISSIONER.
text: The commissioner shall demand a report of any such company when in the commissioner's judgment the interest of the public or policyholders so require; and the proper officers of the company shall make prompt reply to the demand and answer fully all interrogations regarding its business methods, financial condition, and other matters pertaining to its business. The provisions of chapter 60B shall apply to such companies.
